downloadTitle: Hotfix (KB3199763) for MIcrosoft AppFabric v1.1 for Windows Server
downloadDescription: Hotfix (KB3199763) for MIcrosoft AppFabric v1.1 for Windows Server
detailsSection:
This Hotfix (KB3199763) contains a number of bug fixes for Microsfot AppFabric 1.1 for Windows Server.

These bug fixes are for the hosting services provided in AppFabric 1.1.

Please refer to the Knowledge Base article for additional details on the fixes included in this update: KB3199763.

This Cumulative Update includes all features and bug fixes that were included in previous Cumulative Updates for AppFabric 1.1 for Windows Server.
  • 3042099: Cumulative Update 7 for Microsoft AppFabric 1.1 for Windows Server
  • 3042099: Cumulative Update 6 for Microsoft AppFabric 1.1 for Windows Server
  • 2932678: Cumulative Update 5 for Microsoft AppFabric 1.1 for Windows Server
  • 2800726: Cumulative Update 4 for Microsoft AppFabric 1.1 for Windows Server
  • 2787717: Cumulative Update 3 for Microsoft AppFabric 1.1 for Windows Server
  • 2716015: Cumulative Update 2 for Microsoft AppFabric 1.1 for Windows Server
  • 2671763: Cumulative Update 1 for Microsoft AppFabric 1.1 for Windows Server
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating Systems:

Windows Vista Service Pack 2, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2012 R2



AppFabric can be installed on the following operating systems:
  • Windows Server 2012 R2
  • Windows Server 2012
  • Windows Server 2008 R2
  • Windows Server 2008 Service Pack 2


AppFabric can be installed for development and testing on the following operating systems:
  • Windows 8
  • Windows 7
  • Windows Vista Service Pack 2


Supported Architectures:
  • 32-bit (x86)
  • 64-bit (x64)


Software Requirements:
  • To apply this Cumulative Update package, AppFabric 1.1 for Windows Server must already be installed on the computer.
  • Additionally, you must have the Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 installed.


Privilege Requirements:
  • Before running the executable, you must have administrative privilege on the computer where you are installing the software.
installInstructionSection:
To install the update for AppFabric Hotfix (KB3199763):



  • Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
  • Alternatively, you can click Save to download the .exe installer file to your computer. Then, navigate to the location at which you saved the .exe file, right-click on it and select 'Run as Administrator', click on 'Yes' when prompted and follow the instructions shown in the installer.
